text: Was charged another 14.95 a month after my original order! No one is giving me any answers as to why. There is not a way to log in and check your account to see what they charged. No email to let me know why or what is going on. SCAM! Now I am worried about the information they have regarding my checking account. Avoid this company and order from the bank.
title: SCAM! CHARGED 14.95 a month later for no reason.

reply.message: Hello Amanda, I am very sorry for the unexpected charge! Please reach out to us via email at customer_inquiry@bgeltd.com with the order information or your full address, with a description of the issue so we can look into this for you! -Britney

text: As others have stated I ordered on the telephone. Well, they reviewed the order but did not mention additional items added to the order or the additional fees they added. The actual costs made those checks about the same as your bank charges. When I noticed the fees, I called and complained. They freely admitted they do not tell people about the additional fees. Also, they said they could not remove the fees because I already received my order. How could I complain prior to receiving my order as my order had the only information I was given about their scam. So ignore the sorry about the confusion please call us as this is just a way to counter bad reviews.
title: Most expensive cheap checks you can buy

reply.message: Hello, I am sorry for any concerns you have with the billing of your order. If you are in need of any assistance or wish to discuss this in more detail, please email us at customer_inquiry@bgeltd.com with your order information. -Amy

text: Big rip off the way they operate and allow their website to attempt to scam you into paying for many additional items.  Complete scam and not to be trusted.  Then they mislead you about shipping and illegally try to get you to sign on for free shipping BUT in the very small misleading print, they then automatically charge you 14.95....WHAT A RIP OFF.  Stay away and order your checks from a reputable company like Wal Mart Checks
title: Big rip off the way they operate and…

text: Poor customer service. Got disconnected when I reported a mistake then told because I ordered in line they would not fix the mistake. Will never order from them again. Guess this isn’t the first time it happened after reading the very poor reviews.

reply.message: Hello Joleen, I am very sorry to learn of your experience! If you are in need of assistance, please reach out to us via email at customer_inquiry@bgeltd.com with the order information or your full address, with a description of the issue so we can assist you! -Britney

text:
Beware when ordering your checks through Bradford and make sure you have never ordered from them before and double check your credit card statement.
They claim I had ordered checks from them before and wasn't eligible for the online price.  They don't give you any notice till after your order is completed and just rebill your credit card without notification.  Of course they claim no refunds and the price is more than what the bank charges.  Seems like a bait and switch.  Buyer beware!!
title: Buyer beware....

reply.message: Hello Beth, I am very sorry to learn of your experience! If you are in need of assistance, please reach out to us via email at customer_inquiry@bgeltd.com with the order information or your full address, with a description of the issue so we can assist you! -Britney

text: Longtime customer of this companter. I ordered new checks from this company recently. The checks were great. Unfortunately, Bradford Exchange started charging me $14.95/month for something called Bradford Exchange Rewards program. I did not sign up for this program. I called Bradford Exchange and my credit card company to dispute the charges. I will not be doing business with this company again.
title: Bradford Exchange Rewards - Scam Alert

text:
Would not correct their error. -- They sent me checks with an incorrect routing number. I was told they could not correct their error because I ordered online (vs by phone). Ridiculous. Do not order from them.
*Update- One week later, I was contacted by a manager, who said they reordered the checks for me, at no cost to the customer.  Today I received the checks and they are corrected. Thank you Bradford Exchange!

text: Been using Bradford Checks for years.  They are good, but you have to watch out for the hidden up-charges when you order.  Today I ordered checks and by mistake, I clicked on an offer that would bill my credit card $14.95 per month for the rest of my life!  I had to call to get it cancelled.  Very sleazy.
title: Watch out for hidden up-charges

reply.message: Hello Brian, Thank you for the feedback, I will be sure to pass it along. – Britney

text: Ordered checks from Bradford Exchange Checks.  Very happy with the design that I got. Started using the checks, when things started going wrong. Checked in with my bank and unfortunately there was a number missing with my account Number ,  Checks were returned to my bank, and the checks I had wrote I was charged late fees and interest fees.  Not a Happy camper. I now have 9 books of useless  checks , Ended up ordering checks straight from the bank. and I'm out over $100.00   will not be ordering from Bradford again
title: Ordered checks from Bradford Exchange…miss printed checks

reply.message: Hello Denise, I'm sorry to hear you had issue with your order. Please contact us at customer_inquiry@bgeltd.com , with your order information and/or billing address and a brief description so that we can assist you. -Lynette

text: I have used Bradford checks for years to order my checking supplies and i have never had any issues until this last time. the ordering went well and I received my order in a timely manner, but now i'm getting a monthly charge of 14.95 a month for something i never signed up for.

text: I have made 3 attempts to place an order of 4 boxes. June 25, 2019, the check was $10.01 short. I canceled the order and they gave me full reimbursement. Aug. 30, 2019, I placed the same order, this time for the full amount requested. They returned the check along with invoice stamped "DUPLICATE REQUEST," w/o filling the order. Today, I called to get a price per box. Ms. Dana informed me that w/o re-confirmation of my bank info she could not give me a price. Are your prices based on a customer's bank balance, or are your price per box based on repeat customers vs new customers?

reply.message: Hello Denise, I am sorry to learn of your experience! Please reach out to us via email at customer_inquiry@bgeltd.com with the order information or your full address so we can assist you! -Stephanie

text:
My 83 year old mother has been inundated by catalogues from this company and as she struggles to get out made a purchase.  Having sent payment by cheque they continually chased her for payment insisting the cheque had not been received and increase the cost every time.  Eventually I settled by direct credit only to find out less than a week later they had banked the check.  This all happened in September, Its now December and after numerous unanswered phone calls and emails my widowed mother who lives on state and disability benefit is still £127 out of pocket.  Steer clear and warn elderly family members to do the same.

I posted this review in 2016 and 5 years later Bradfordexchange respond sadly 2 years after my late mothers death and she never received the funds stolen from her by this company.  As an elderly lady on her on and surviving on benefits I will never forgive them
title: They prey on the elderly and vunerable

reply.message: Hello Loraine, I'm sorry to hear of your mother's experience and would love to assists. Please contact us at customer_inquiry@bgeltd.com, with your order information and/or billing address and a brief description for assistance.-Lynette
